ui.thallium.title: Thallium
ui.thallium.description: "A shared code library for friends and foes alike!"
ui.thallium.load.suggest: Run %s to bring up this menu again
ui.thallium.menu.warning: You are not using that command right! Please only use %s, nothing more.
item.thallium.lead_ingot.description.1: The only thing I remember from before, you
item.thallium.lead_ingot.description.2: know... the End is my right thumb.
item.thallium.lead_ingot.description.3: One day I slammed it in my car's door and...
item.thallium.lead_ingot.description.4: it half-tore the nail off my thumb.
item.thallium.lead_ingot.description.5: It hurt like a b*tch! After time, like,
item.thallium.lead_ingot.description.6: a week or so later, this little new
item.thallium.lead_ingot.description.8: And it was pushing the old nail out, it was
item.thallium.lead_ingot.description.9: just, like, hanging off and it kept getting
item.thallium.lead_ingot.description.10: caught on my clothes... and if I rolled over it
item.thallium.lead_ingot.description.11: in my sleep, it kinda woulda hurt...
item.thallium.lead_ingot.description.12: And I just got aggravated and sick of
item.thallium.lead_ingot.description.13: it and one day I just tore the nail off!
item.thallium.lead_ingot.description.14: And there was this tiny shriveled thumbnail
item.thallium.lead_ingot.description.16: I was wondering... was it ever gonna grow back right?
item.thallium.lead_ingot.description.17: Is my thumb ever gonna look normal again or...
item.thallium.lead_ingot.description.18: is this just gonna be my thumb now, for
item.thallium.lead_ingot.description.20: I was picking at it when the bombs fell...
Utilize %s by putting them in the pouch
item.thallium.trinket_pouch.creative_war: Trinket Pouches will not update their tooltip in Creative mode due to a vanilla bug
